structure:Codelist.common:Name: Building Categories Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Classification of building types and categories for construction and building statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Special Processing Code
structure:Code.common:Description: Special code used for data processing and layout purposes.

structure:Code.common:Name: Unspecified
structure:Code.common:Description: Building category not specified or classified.

structure:Code.common:Name: Manufacturing
structure:Code.common:Description: Industrial and manufacturing buildings, factories, and production facilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Agricultural
structure:Code.common:Description: Agricultural buildings, barns, storage facilities, and farming infrastructure.

structure:Code.common:Name: Offices
structure:Code.common:Description: Office buildings, administrative facilities, and corporate headquarters.

structure:Code.common:Name: Educational
structure:Code.common:Description: Educational buildings, schools, universities, and training facilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Commercial
structure:Code.common:Description: Commercial buildings, retail spaces, and business establishments.

structure:Code.common:Name: Short stay accommodation (rooms for rent)
structure:Code.common:Description: Short-term accommodation facilities, guest rooms, and temporary lodging.

structure:Code.common:Name: Livestock
structure:Code.common:Description: Livestock buildings, animal housing, and agricultural animal facilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Other
structure:Code.common:Description: Other building categories not covered by specific classifications.

structure:Code.common:Name: Residences for communities
structure:Code.common:Description: Residential buildings for community living, group housing, and shared facilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Hotels
structure:Code.common:Description: Hotel buildings, hospitality facilities, and accommodation establishments.

structure:Code.common:Name: Health care
structure:Code.common:Description: Healthcare buildings, hospitals, clinics, and medical facilities.
